title: Manage Cable Bolt Installation
description: An underground ground support crew installs long cable bolts into the roof of a tunnel to ensure long-term stability.

tasks.description: Review the ground support plan for the area, which specifies the location, length, and angle of the required cable bolts.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew is aware of the design requirements.

tasks.description: Drill the long holes for the cables to the specified length and angle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The holes are drilled according to the design.

tasks.description: Insert the steel cables, pump grout into the holes to anchor them, and then tension the cables to the required load.
tasks.expected_outcome: The cable bolts are installed and tensioned correctly, and the installation is recorded as complete.
